item.title: Home
item.description: from libqtile.config import Key, Screen, Group, Drag, Click from libqtile.command import lazy from libqtile import layout, bar, widget try: from typing import List # noqa: F401 except ImportError: pass mod = "mod4" keys = [ # Switch between windows in current stack pane Key([mod], "k", lazy.layout.down()), Key([mod], "j", lazy.layout.up()), # Move windows up or down in current stack Key([mod, "control"], "k", lazy.
